

# Link your WhatsApp Business account to Sema               

In this article we explain what a WhatsApp Business account is and how to link it to your Sema account.

## What is a WhatsApp Business account? {-}

A WhatsApp Business account is a WhatsApp account designed specifically for your business , as opposed to the traditional WhatsApp account you probably use with friends and colleagues.

You can manage your WhatsApp Business account from the [WhatsApp Business Manager](https://business.facebook.com/) , which allows you to access your WhatsApp Business account information, settings, notifications, messages and phone numbers.

![Statistiques WhatsApp Business Manager](www/stat.png){width=100%}

## Link your WhatsApp Business account to Sema {-}

With in-app registration, you can log in to your Facebook and WhatsApp Business accounts. All these steps are necessary to link your WhatsApp Business account to Sema

### Connect your Facebook and WhatsApp Business accounts to Sema {-}

Follow the in-app registration steps to create or connect your Facebook and WhatsApp Business accounts to Sema:

1. Still from the **Sign in with Facebook** page, click **To start up** to accept the WhatsApp and Facebook terms and conditions. {-}

![](www/step2.png){width=100%}

2. **Create your Meta business accounts**

If you already have a Facebook business account, your information will be populated automatically. Select your Facebook business account from the list or create a new one directly using the integrated registration. Click **Continue**.

* **Select a business account**

<video width="100%" controls autoplay muted>
  <source src="www/selectBusiness.mp4" type="video/mp4">
 
</video>


* **Create a professional account**

<video width="100%" controls autoplay muted>
  <source src="www/newBusiness.mp4" type="video/mp4">
 
</video>


3. **Create your WhatsApp Business profile**

If you already have a WhatsApp Business profile, your information will be populated automatically. Select your WhatsApp Business profile from the list or create a new one directly using the in-app registration. Click **Continue**.

* **Select a WhatsApp Business profile**

![](www/selectNumber.png){width=100%}

* **Create a WhatsApp Business profile**

<video width="100%" controls autoplay muted>
  <source src="www/newWaba.mp4" type="video/mp4">
 
</video>

4. **Verify a WhatsApp Business phone number**

Choose a phone number for your WhatsApp Business account and verify it. You can :

- Select the number used to create your Facebook account;

- Register a new one;

- or [migrate your phone number]() registered with the WhatsApp Messenger or WhatsApp Business application for use with the WhatsApp Business platform.

5. Choose a verification method. You can receive a code by **SMS** or **voice call** . Click **Continue**, then enter the 6-digit verification code received via SMS or call and click **Verify**.

![](www/addphone.jpg){width=50%}

Your WhatsApp Business account is now associated with Sema! However, you still need [to have your WhatsApp Business account verified](./) by Facebook services to be able to send more than two hundred and fifty messages per day with the WhatsApp Campaigns app.
